text: Milley is a :surname. Notable individuals with this surname include: * Mark A. Milley (b. 1958), four star general, Chief of Staff of the US Army since 2015 * Norm Milley (b. 1980), Canadian former professional ice hockey player * Thomas Milley (lived c. 1500), for whom Dr Milley's Hospital in Lichfield, UK was named *Olusha S. Milley (b. 1975), artist Like many surnames, Milley also appears as a middle name: * John Milley Doyle (1781-1856), Anglo-Irish soldier == See also == * Millie Category:English-language surnames
title: Milley
